year: 2019

region: Pacific Region
abstract: |
  The status of two stocks of Pacific Cod (*Gadus macrocephalus*) in Hecate Strait/Queen Charlotte Sound (Area 5ABCD) and West Coast Vancouver Island (Area 3CD) was updated from the 2018 assessment, using Bayesian delay-difference models and data streams updated to 2019. The models were fit to fishery-independent indices of abundance and standardized commercial catch-per-unit-effort (CPUE) indices, updated from the 2018 stock assessment.
